document_metadata.title: Official Chapter 13 Order of Discharge - February 9, 2024
document_metadata.court: United States Bankruptcy Court - Western District of New York
document_metadata.primary_purpose: Legal termination of debts and establishment of FCRA creditor obligations

discharge_order.legal_effect: Eliminates personal liability for debts provided for by Chapter 13 plan
creditor_prohibitions: Cannot sue debtor on discharged debts
Cannot contact debtor by mail, phone, or otherwise to collect
Violations can result in damages and attorney's fees

key_creditor_notifications.addresses: Multiple addresses including Oklahoma City and Troy MI
key_creditor_notifications.significance: Formal notice of discharge - ongoing violations willful

key_creditor_notifications.addresses: PO Box 830, Lockport, NY and c/o Chiari & Ilecki

key_creditor_notifications.legal_counsel: Multiple attorneys at Davidson Fink LLP
key_creditor_notifications.significance: Mortgage servicer formally notified through counsel

fcra_implications.updating_obligations: Under FCRA §1681s-2(a)(1)(A), furnishers must update tradelines to reflect discharge
fcra_implications.reporting_restrictions: Under FCRA §1681c(a)(3), bankruptcy information must be accurately reported
fcra_implications.violation_threshold: Any failure to update after formal notice constitutes direct FCRA violation
fcra_implications.willfulness_establishment: Certificate of Notice proves creditor knowledge - post-discharge violations willful

timeline_significance.event: Case closed with discharge WITHHELD due to missing DS2830
Coordinated creditor attack during vulnerability window
timeline_significance.significance: 10 negative items appear during unprotected period

timeline_significance.event: Official discharge granted and creditors formally notified
timeline_significance.significance: End of vulnerability window - FCRA protection fully restored

timeline_significance.event: Certificate of Notice mailed to all creditors
timeline_significance.significance: Final formal notification - all post-date violations willful

post_discharge_violations_enabled.ally_financial: 569+ days of continued false 'wage earner plan' reporting
post_discharge_violations_enabled.discover: 403 days of false charge-off reporting (admitted March 18, 2025)
post_discharge_violations_enabled.systematic_pattern: Multiple creditors ignored formal discharge notification
post_discharge_violations_enabled.willfulness_proof: Certificate of Notice eliminates good faith defense for all creditors

legal_protections_established.personal_liability: Eliminated for all debts provided for in Chapter 13 plan
legal_protections_established.contact_prohibition: No mail, phone, or other contact for collection purposes
legal_protections_established.enforcement_remedies: Violations can result in damages and attorney's fees to debtor
legal_protections_established.lien_preservation: Property liens may still be enforced unless avoided

strategic_significance.willfulness_establishment: Formal creditor notification eliminates good faith defense
strategic_significance.violation_baseline: All post-February 9, 2024 false reporting is willful
strategic_significance.damages_foundation: Establishes legal protection period for calculating harm
strategic_significance.case_cornerstone: Most critical document proving creditor knowledge and obligations
